languages.text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 10 stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a} direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects, and all the stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} are removed.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.

Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect, they gain +1 stack of the inevitability effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 10 stacks of inevitability, they deal <u>(Medicae / 10)</u> direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects and all the stacks of inevitability are removed.

languages.text:
Cuando el portador inflige un efecto de daño continuado, gana +1 acumulación del efecto {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitabilidad{/g}.
En cuanto el portador gana 10 acumulaciones de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitabilidad{/g}, inflige {uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a} de daño directo a todos los enemigos afectados por efectos de daño continuado y pierde todas las acumulaciones de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitabilidad{/g}.

languages.text:
使用者が継続ダメージ効果を与えるたび、使用者は{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}必然性{/g}効果を+1スタック得る。
使用者が{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}必然性{/g}を10スタック得ると、{uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a}の直接ダメージをあらゆる継続ダメージ効果を受けているすべての敵に与え、すべての{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}必然性{/g}スタックが取り除かれる。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 10 stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a} direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects, and all the stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} are removed.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が継続ダメージ効果を与えるたび、使用者は{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}必然性{/g}効果を+1スタック得る。
使用者が{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}必然性{/g}を10スタック得ると、<u>(メディケア/10)</u>の直接ダメージをあらゆる継続ダメージ効果を受けているすべての敵に与え、すべての{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}必然性{/g}スタックが取り除かれる。

使用者が継続ダメージ効果を与えるたび、使用者は{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}必然性{/g}効果を+1スタック得る。
使用者が{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}必然性{/g}を10スタック得ると、{uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a}の直接ダメージをあらゆる継続ダメージ効果を受けているすべての敵に与え、すべての{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}必然性{/g}スタックが取り除かれる。

languages.text:
每当装备者施加持续伤害效果时，都会获得1层{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}效果。
当装备者拥有10层{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}效果时，移除所有{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}层数，对所有受到持续伤害效果影响的敌人造成{uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a}点直击伤害。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 10 stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a} direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects, and all the stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} are removed.

traits.locale_text:

当装备者拥有10层{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}效果时，移除所有{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}层数，对所有受到持续伤害效果影响的敌人造成<u>（医疗/10）</u>点直击伤害。

每当装备者施加持续伤害效果时，都会获得1层{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}效果。
当装备者拥有10层{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}效果时，移除所有{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}死劫将至{/g}层数，对所有受到持续伤害效果影响的敌人造成{uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a}点直击伤害。

languages.text:
Chaque fois que le porteur inflige un effet de dégâts progressifs, il gagne +1 cumul de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Fatalité{/g}.
Au bout de 10 cumuls de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Fatalité{/g}, les cumuls sont consommés pour infliger {uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a} points de dégâts directs à tous les ennemis souffrant d'effets de dégâts progressifs.{g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}{/g}
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.

Au bout de 10 cumuls de {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Fatalité{/g}, les cumuls sont consommés pour infliger <u>(Medicae / 10)</u> points de dégâts directs à tous les ennemis souffrant d'effets de dégâts progressifs.

languages.text:
Bewirkt der Träger einen Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekt, erhält er +1 Stapel des {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Unausweichlichkeit{/g}-Effektes.
Sobald der Träger 10 Stapel {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Unausweichlichkeit{/g} hat, fügt er allen Gegnern unter dem Einfluss von Schaden-über-Zeit-effekten {uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a} Direktschaden zu und alle Stapel von {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}Unausweichlichkeit{/g} werden entfernt.

Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.

languages.text:
Накладывая эффект периодического урона, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимость{/g}.
Как только персонаж набирает 10 уровней {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимости{/g}, он наносит {uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a} прямого урона всем противникам, на которых действуют эффекты периодического урона, после чего все уровни {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимости{/g} снимаются.

Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 10 stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a} direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects, and all the stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} are removed.

Как только персонаж набирает 10 уровней {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимости{/g}, он наносит <u>(Медицина / 10)</u> прямого урона всем противникам, на которых действуют эффекты периодического урона, после чего все уровни {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}неотвратимости{/g} снимаются.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, zamanla hasar veren bir etkiye sebep olduğunda +1 {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}kaçınılmazlık{/g} etkisi birikimi kazanır.
Takan kişi, 10 {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}kaçınılmazlık{/g} birikimi elde ettiğinde herhangi bir zamanla hasar veren etkiden muzdarip olan tüm düşmanlara {uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a} doğrudan hasar verir ve tüm {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}kaçınılmazlık{/g} birikimleri ortadan kalkar.
